text: Emery Ruelle was a professional ice hockey player who played for the Marquette Iron Rangers, Waterloo Black Hawks and Green Bay Bobcats of United States Hockey League. In 1966, he played on the United States men's national ice hockey team that was sent to compete at the International Ice Hockey Federation World Championship.http://www.cchockeyhistory.org/legends/R.htm ==References== == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American men's ice hockey forwards Category:Ice hockey people from Michigan Category:People from Houghton, Michigan
title: Emery Ruelle
